snippet.title: Paranoia: Happiness is Mandatory | Dev Diary (Gamescom 2019)
snippet.description:
Pre-order Paranoia: Happiness is Mandatory now: https://www.epicgames.com/store/en-US/product/paranoia/ultraviolet-edition

After checking with Friend Computer, we can confirm that Paranoia: Happiness is Mandatory will release on October 3rd, 2019 on PC and later on consoles.

As part of a special mission ordered by Friend Computer, our reporter was sent to Ireland to investigate Black Shamrock, the studio developing Paranoia: Happiness is Mandatory, amidst rumours that one of the team could be guilty of treason…

Paranoia: Happiness is Mandatory: a darkly humorous CRPG, adapted from the tabletop role-playing game created by Dan Gelber, Greg Costikyan and Eric Goldberg.

-------------------------------

To gain more credentials for Paranoia: Happiness is Mandatory, you must follow the Friend Computer on:
Facebook ► https://www.facebook.com/PlayParanoia
Twitter ► https://twitter.com/PlayParanoia

-------------------------------

We also authorize you to follow Bigben Games on: 
Facebook ► https://www.facebook.com/bigbengames
Twitter ►https://twitter.com/Bigben_Games

#Gamescom2019
